desc_content.paragraph: A view for retrieving Program Discussion IFrame .

list_item.paragraph: 200: OK - Contains a program discussion iframe.
401: The requesting user is not authenticated.
403: The requesting user lacks access to the program.
404: The requested program does not exist.

block_quote.paragraph: In the case of a 200 response code, the response will be iframe HTML and status if discussion is configured for the program.
id=’lti-tab-embed’ style=’width: 100%; min-height: 800px; border: none’ srcdoc=’{srcdoc}’

desc_content.paragraph: A view for retrieving Program live IFrame .

list_item.paragraph: 200: OK - Contains a program live zoom iframe.
401: The requesting user is not authenticated.
403: The requesting user lacks access to the program.
404: The requested program does not exist.

block_quote.paragraph: In the case of a 200 response code, the response will be iframe HTML and status if discussion is configured for the program.
id=’lti-tab-embed’ style=’width: 100%; min-height: 800px; border: none’ srcdoc=’{srcdoc}’
